DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Flutamide Treating Women With Premenstrual Dysphoric Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Premenstrual dysphoric disorder ( PMDD ) condition affect 5 % menstruate woman . Women PMDD experience serious emotional physical disturbance , may include depression , tension , irritability , anger , anxiety , sleep appetite problem . Symptoms PMDD directly link menstrual cycle , generally begin latter half cycle end around start next cycle . If leave unmanaged , PMDD may interfere woman 's ability carry normal day-to-day functioning . Current treatment PMDD include medication , psychotherapy , nutritional modification . Flutamide , medication block action testosterone mood-influencing hormone , may helpful alleviate symptom PMDD . This study evaluate effectiveness flutamide reduce symptom premenstrual dysphoric disorder . This two-phase study last total 4 month include 7 study visit . Phase 1 last 2 month include Visits 1 3 . During Phase 1 , participant keep daily record symptom , participate diagnostic interview , undergo medical history review , physical exam , screen laboratory test . Eligible participant enter Phase 2 , treatment phase study . During treatment phase , participant randomly assign take flutamide placebo 2 month . Study visit occur every 2 week include Visits 4 7 . These visit include discussion side effect , symptom rating , laboratory test check pregnancy side effect relate liver function , blood count , blood chemistry . At end treatment flutamide placebo , participant option receive treatment sertraline , antidepressant know effective many woman PMDD . Sertraline give 2 premenstrual week two cycle . If participant already unsuccessfully tried sertraline PMDD treatment , alternative treatment attempt .
